name: Jenkins LTS (Final Fixed)
author: augesrob@augesrob.net
description: A fully working Jenkins LTS egg for Pterodactyl. Uses Java 17, installs Jenkins automatically, and runs on your chosen port. Fixed reserved variable issue.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Jenkins LTS Installer for Pterodactyl
set -e

apt update -y && apt install -y wget ca-certificates openjdk-17-jre-headless

cd /mnt/server

# Download verified LTS WAR
wget -O jenkins.war https://get.jenkins.io/war-stable/2.479.3/jenkins.war

# Create Jenkins home directory
mkdir -p jenkins_home
chmod -R 755 /mnt/server
chown -R 1000:1000 /mnt/server

echo "✅ Jenkins 2.479.3 installed successfully."
echo "➡️  WAR: /mnt/server/jenkins.war"
echo "➡️  Home: /mnt/server/jenkins_home"
echo "➡️  Port: ${JENKINS_PORT}"
echo "Installation complete."

variables.name: Jenkins Port
variables.description: The port Jenkins will listen on.
